definition: to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-

sentences.english: Before I got these, my allergies would turn into weeks-long sinus infections.
sentences.chinese: 在我开始使用前，过敏症状已变成持续几周的鼻炎。

sentences.english: Pharmacologist is seriously studying the hypersusceptibility reaction of this medicine.
sentences.chinese: 药理学家们正在认真研究这种药的过敏反应。

sentences.english: Why are GM foods potentially allergenic?
sentences.chinese: 为什么转基因食物可能会引起过敏？

sentences.english: In addition to CMPA, they were allergic to other food at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 除对牛乳蛋白过敏外，同时也对其他食物过敏。

sentences.english: In addition to CMPA, they were allergic to other food at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 除对牛乳蛋白过敏外，同时也对其他食物过敏。

sentences.english: Anaphylaxis, as discussed earlier in the week, may also present with bronchoconstriction.
sentences.chinese: 如前讨论所述，过敏反应也可出现支气管收缩。

sentences.english: This policy brief is an attempt to put concerns relating to potential allergenicity into perspective.
sentences.chinese: 本篇政策摘要将透视对潜在过敏性的担忧。

sentences.english: Donkey milk also has anti-allergen properties and is just 1% fat.
sentences.chinese: 驴奶还含有抗过敏物质，而且脂肪含量仅占1%。

sentences.english: My teeth are very sensitive to cold food.
Objective To investigate the efficacy of anisodamine in the treatment of simplex anaphylactoid purpura.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价山莨菪碱治疗单纯型过敏性紫癜的临床疗效。

sentences.english: Take the heat out of them with plantain, which has both anti-inflammatory and antiallergenic properties.
sentences.chinese: 可用具有抗炎和抗过敏作用的车前草熏来消炎止痒。

sentences.english: There were 18 inhalational allergens in allergen steep.
sentences.chinese: 变应原浸液内含18种常见吸入性过敏原。

sentences.english: It's no cure for the severely allergic, and a single injection costs $500.
sentences.chinese: 它对严重过敏症无效，每支售价500美元。

sentences.english: Edward always gets heebie jeebies from deadlines.
sentences.chinese: 爱德华总是对截止日期神经过敏。

sentences.english: I could have gone into Anaphylactic Shock.
sentences.chinese: 我可能会过敏性休克的。

definition: intolerance (for lactose, gluten or other foods)
